channel.title: Help with rscd forums please?
channel.description:
well i went to make a categorie on my forums and it said this when i hit enter:
Bad HTTP_REFERER. If you have moved these forums from one location to another or switched domains, you need to update the Base URL manually in the database (look for o_base_url in the config table) and then clear the cache by deleting all .php files in the /cache directory.
what is the /cache directory?
in the o_base_url i seen it said http://localhost, and i went to admin then optins on forums and changed that to, http://localhost and it says the same thing. i dont know what to do :S

item.title: Help with rscd forums please?
item.dc:creator: @I_PR0PKER_I I_PR0PKER_I
item.description:
@I_PR0PKER_I wrote:

Ive gotten this problem too, just delete that, and make sre the same are in the db too.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with rscd forums please?
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

Delete the files in the /cache folder. The cache folder is just filled with PHP scripts that have data taken from the database (so you dont query the database too much).

Read full topic

item.title: Help with rscd forums please?
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

it only does this when you do it via localhost
use ur ip.

Read full topic
